metadata.title: CVE-2018-19827 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In LibSass 3.5.5, a use-after-free vulnerability exists in the SharedPtrclass in SharedPtr.cpp (or SharedPtr.hpp) that may cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
